subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: St. Louis will play Game 1 of the N.L.C.S. on Wednesday at Shea Stadium, and while the Mets may be giddy about it, this is the same old stuff for the Cardinals.
snippet: St. Louis will play Game 1 of the N.L.C.S. on Wednesday at Shea Stadium, and while the Mets may be giddy about it, this is the same old stuff for the Cardinals.
